about_the_game:
This is a small and well-designed firework simulator. All you have to do is open the game and watch it quietly.
- Endless fireworks, adding many colors to your life.
- Carefully simulated sound effects, explosion sounds are clear and pleasant.
- The fireworks effect can be adjusted arbitrarily, and the fireworks shape can be customized.

In any festival that needs fireworks, or any time that needs to be in a daze to watch fireworks, I will be your faithful friend.
detailed_description:
This is a small and well-designed firework simulator. All you have to do is open the game and watch it quietly.
- Endless fireworks, adding many colors to your life.
- Carefully simulated sound effects, explosion sounds are clear and pleasant.
- The fireworks effect can be adjusted arbitrarily, and the fireworks shape can be customized.

In any festival that needs fireworks, or any time that needs to be in a daze to watch fireworks, I will be your faithful friend.

short_description: This is a firework simulator game. Anytime you want to set off fireworks, this is one of the best.
